features: 【AIRPLNE FRIENDLY UNDERSEAT BAG】We specially designed suitable size to measure 13.78x7.87x7.87 in; This under seat flight bag is EXACTLY This is a relatively large size you can take for free in the cabin when flying with most airlines world-wide; Including United Airlines, American Airlines, Frontier Airlines, TUI Fly, Southwest Airlines, Ryanair, easyJet, British Airways, Etihad, Emirates, Delta, Flybe, Lufthansa, Norwegian, Jet2, KLM and Quatar to name just a few.

【PRACTICALITY DURABLE TRAVEL BAG】This compact holdall made from premium quality oxford cloth which is lightweight and strong to withstand the rigours of modern transport. It features two handles on the top with a velcro clasp to carry by hand; Also it includes a length-adjustable shoulder strap to release your hand conveniently. Integrated trolley sleeve slides over rolling luggage handle making any travel a breeze.

【SMALL PERSONAL ITEM BAG】Dimensions: 35x20x20cm, weight 0.66lb/0.3 kg, capacity 14 L. Designed specifically as a small free of charge carry on board baggage for the budget Ryanair airline. Reasonable space design make travel essentials well organized; One inner mesh bag for passport. The convenient front zipped pocket is an ideal space for your travel documents and any items you need to quick access to.

【MULTI-PURPOSE DUFFEL BAG】Kono 3 in 1 gym tote bag is a perfect reliable companion for both indoor and outdoor sports. It is a great shoulder bag for workout, travel, sports activity, tennis, basketball, yoga, fishing, hunting, camping, hiking and many outdoor activities. Suitable for sport gym bag, school duffle bag, travel duffel bag, travel holdall bag, gym holdall,etc.

【CONSIDERATE AND COMFORTABLE】Buy with confidence! If you are not satisfied with Kono Travel Duffel Bag, we offer a 60-day return and money back guarantee, and 1-year replacement for defective items. Any question just freely contact us, we'll provide efficient customer support.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Just the right bag for me
reviews.reviewText: I got this bag to bring personal items for an overnight hospital stay. I debated which size to get and finally decided on the 20L bag. It was the perfect size, not too big but big enough to carry quite a few things. The bag itself seems to be of good quality with respect to materials and construction. I was especially happy to see that the zippers are sturdy and not the small, cheap plastic ones you find so often on items nowadays. they look like they will last a long time with use. Overall, I am quite happy with this bag and would recommend it to friends in need of an overnight bag.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent product, perfect shape and dimensions for under seat bag - love this bag!
reviews.reviewText: I have several small duffels, and this one is the best by far. It’s durable but very lightweight, doesn’t show wear or pick up dirt, and its rectangular shape maximizes the amount of contents. So far, I’ve used it for 3 and 4 day trips, and it has easily held all the clothes, shoes, and other travel needs. Easy to carry, easy to get things in and out. Perfect dimensions for under seat with room on top for a hand bag or computer case. Excellent value, excellent design.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Works great as a personal item for United
reviews.reviewText: I was looking for a personal item bag on the smaller end because United's bag policies require a smaller size than other airlines. This bag worked perfectly. It fit everything I needed but I was careful not to overstuff it. I only knocked the star off because I had to buy a wider crossbody strap. The strap that comes with the bag is way too narrow to comfortably hold up this bag when it's full.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect personal item size
reviews.reviewText: I bought this for a flight where I was only allowed to bring a personal item and the airline was strict on size. This was the perfect size, fit perfectly under the seat with space left for my feet. I was able to fit a weeks worth of clothes inside. Real item matches the pictures

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewText: They are perfect for our short trip. Fit under the seats and we had plenty of room for an overnight stay.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars great to save money on bag fees
reviews.reviewText: I frequently fly Avelo Airlines who charges $43 for a carry-on bag. I save money by using this travel bag as a free personal item instead of a carry-on. This Small Size bag is the exact length and 1 inch less in width than the maximum size they allowed in 2023. Actually I now see that Avelo increased their personal item limits in 2024, so you would be better to buy the Medium Size bag instead. But my Small Size bag can hold more than you think. If you are tight on space you can always wear your jacket or sweatshirt instead of packing it. The only criticism I have is that this bag does not have a firm bottom. However, the flexible bottom allows you to squeeze the bag when you need to. One reviewer said he cut out a cardboard bottom to insert in the bag.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect small duffle
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this to carry items such as sunglasses, gloves and other items in my boat. It’s a perfect size and does not take up much room but can hold everything I need.

The item arrived defective. Stitching coming apart plus defective fabric. I wanted to just contact the seller directly with these issues (since the return deadline had passed by the time I opened the product) but the seller does not provide a way to contact them on Amazon.

Reviewed in the United Kingdom on December 16, 2022
reviews.reviewText: Fits in more than you’d think for a small bag.used it on Ryanair no problem. Fits under seat perfectly. We’ve bought a 2nd one.
